name: Circle of Kerzoven
storyline: In a profoundly simulated world, every action has a reaction. Take care of your villagers, resources, production lines and the interaction with the complex environment. How much will you intervene in the course of nature? You decide.
summary: Circle of Kerzoven is a charming settlement-building strategy game paired with a rich simulation experience. Every animal and plant tries to find their place in nature while you lead your villagers to their future. Expand to different regions and trade with local factions to gain needed resources.
